Title: Relates to financial assistance from an industrial development agency; repealer
Summary: Repeals provisions related to requiring projects be located in a highly distressed area in order to qualify for certain financial assistance from an industrial development agency.
LawCode: Rpld ยง854 sub 18, amd ยง862, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to financial assistance from an industrial development agency; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
